item.title: Aggravated fraud, McDonald’s Corporation subsidiary McDonald’s France, 2011, fraudulent “1 chance out of 4” claim
item.description: This is a draft. 法国麦当劳在2011年声称，消费者有四分之一的机会立即获胜。⬇️ /assets/images/posts/frauds-and-crimes/mcdonalds_france_2011_1_chance_out_of_4/2011_mcdonalds_france_1_chance_out_of_4_cup_vertical.jpeg <img srcset="/images/posts/frauds-and-crimes/mcdonalds_france_2011_1_chance_out_of_4/2011_mcdonalds_france_1_chance_out_of_4_cup_vertical_hu7196b668c7f249e8ba0440d458583237_357589_480x280_fill_q90_box_smart1.jpeg 480w, /images/posts/frauds-and-crimes/mcdonalds_france_2011_1_chance_out_of_4/2011_mcdonalds_france_1_chance_out_of_4_cup_vertical_hu7196b668c7f249e8ba0440d458583237_357589_768x280_fill_q90_box_smart1.jpeg 768w, /images/posts/frauds-and-crimes/mcdonalds_france_2011_1_chance_out_of_4/2011_mcdonalds_france_1_chance_out_of_4_cup_vertical_hu7196b668c7f249e8ba0440d458583237_357589_1024x280_fill_q90_box_smart1.jpeg 1024w, /images/posts/frauds-and-crimes/mcdonalds_france_2011_1_chance_out_of_4/2011_mcdonalds_france_1_chance_out_of_4_cup_vertical_hu7196b668c7f249e8ba0440d458583237_357589_1366x280_fill_q90_box_smart1.jpeg 1366w" src="/images/posts/frauds-and-crimes/mcdonalds_france_2011_1_chance_out_of_4/2011_mcdonalds_france_1_chance_out_of_4_cup_vertical.jpeg" alt="banner-image">
